activation.ReallyYourEmail: ʻO kēia anei kāu helu leka uila, {{1}}? Inā pēlā, kaomi ma aneʻi e hoʻonohonoho i kāu ʻōlelo huna a hoʻā i kāu moʻokāki.
activation.SeeYou: E ʻike iā ʻoe ma {{2}} !
activation.Subject: Welina! E ʻoluʻolu e hōʻoia i kāu helu leka uila.

LinkToUnsubscribe: Eia kahi loulou e wehe i ke kau inoa inā ʻaʻole ʻoe makemake e kiʻi hou i nā leka uila.
SeeHistory: E ʻike i ka mōʻaukala uku no {{1}}

charge.HasBeenCharged: ʻAe, he mea kēia e hōʻike aku iā ʻoe ua uku ʻia {{2}} no {{3}} e {{4}}

resend.Thanks: Mahalo no kou kipa ʻana iā {{1}}
resend.YouAreReceiving: Loaʻa iā ʻoe kēia leka uila no ka mea ua komo kekahi i kāu leka uila a kaomi "poina ka ʻōlelo huna". Inā ʻaʻole ʻoe, e haʻalele wale i kēia memo.
resend.Reset: No ka hoʻoponopono hou ʻana i kāu ʻōlelo huna, kaomi iā {{1}}
resend.DomainCode: Inā wehe ʻia ka ʻaoʻao pūnaewele ma kāu polokalamu kele pūnaewele, hiki iā ʻoe ke hoʻokomo i ke code
resend.Subject: E, poina anei ʻoe i kāu ʻōlelo huna?
